bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abū Mīnā in April / May 2013.
bibl.note: 1. The sequence of rooms attached to the northern extremity of the northern transept of the Great Basilica. - 2. A family tomb with a chapel on the eastern margins of the town.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie Copte

bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Jacek Kościuk & Hanna Witte, Report on the Excavations at Abū Mīnā in April / May 2013.

1. The sequence of rooms attached to the northern extremity of the northern transept of the Great Basilica. - 2. A family tomb with a chapel on the eastern margins of the town.
